reference.shortdesc: The toc element indicates to the processing software that the author wants a table of contents generated at the particular location.

section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: If no href attribute is specified on the toc element, an external processor might generate a table of contents at this location. If the href attribute references a topic or map, that topic or map contains a manually created table of contents.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The toc element is specialized from topicref; it is defined in the bookmap module.
